name: Rough Harvest
description:
Rough Harvest

Help farmer Beatrice achieve her farming goals by planting and beating up rowdy vegetables.

A game by Anja Dannenberg, Timur Bahadir and Pierre Alain.

How to play

Plant vegetables by walking to a soil patch and selecting which vegetable you want to plant. After they grow they will attack you.

Move with W, A, S and D. Dash with Space.
Hit them with your shovel by left clicking or throw you pitch fork at them by right clicking.

By killing vegetables you gain coins and ingredients.

If you don't plant anything for too long a soil patch will grow weeds. Weeds will also attack you but won't provide resources when slain.

To win you have to get a certain amount of coins and ingredients.

Note

The game engine we used, Godot, seems to have problems with navigation in the web version. For the full experience download the game and run it on your machine .
